#pgz09

CN-PGZ09 Sight
Zoom : 1.5x - 6.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_pgz_09

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_pgz_09

#m41d

CN - M41D Sight
Zoom : 3.0x-10.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_m_41d

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_m_41d

Historical sight for the Turán 3 with two versions

A little explanation:
The first distance indicator (the one on the left) is for the AP
The second one (the one next to the first) is for both the HE
The third and fourth one (the right ones) is for the machine gun

#turan3 #turaniii #turan_3 #turan_iii #hungary #historical

Recreated the M20 (T35) periscope found on the M103.
Meant to be used with M358 APBC shot
Edited to what I think looks cleaner or easier to read

#t80bvm #t72b3 #t90m

USSR- T80BVM / T72B3 Sight
Zoom :4.0x - 12.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\ussr_t_80bvm

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\ussr_t_80bvm

The sight of T-72B3 with the same ammunition type and sight magnification is universal to T-90M
T72B3的瞄具与T90M通用

~BT-42 HISTORICAL SIGHT~
Aiming with this is hard but fun :)

History:
The BT-42 sight is reused from the Finnish 76K/02 artillery/field gun from 1902. The 76K/02 gun used many different sight variants, but the latest and most common was the German Goertz dial sight. The picture is a German dial sight from 1915 which was in use on many different artillery/field guns, and therefore probably the 76K/02. (Not 100% sure)


Please correct me if I'm wrong!

Sources/explanation/links: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit?usp=s...

skp file included

You guys asked me to upload the sight, so here it is.
Blue is day sight.
Purple is "night sight" but I use it for snow maps.
I downloaded the original sight from CaveNub and then modified the file to fit my needs.

TO INSTALL IT,
use my Super Advanced Installing step system, which was created by using nanotechnology.
Installation tutorial can be found by scrolling through pictures, I put my heart and soul into it.
But I would advise you to seek for proper installation tutorial.
FOR STEAM FIND YOUR WarTinder folder and start from step 4-5

Universal B-21 Raider Sight

The sight IS meant to be used with MBTs, so keep that in mind when choosing to use this with certain tanks.

The text is edited a little, to fit WT's environment a little better and to suit a friend of mine (you know who you are).

Original can be found here: https://twitter.com/atamonica1/status/1703017012258345104

How to install
1. Extract the .zip with your method of choice
2. copy-paste the .blk file to your WT folder in whatever folder WT's installed in, steam included - War Thunder - Usersights - all_tanks
